Articles.Content:
Before we get all J.J. Abrams in KSP, I would like to see some effects that would improve the look and feel of KSP and not just blow out my retinas. Also I imagine they would be togglable in the settings.

Also I realize the game is still early in development and some of these are not possible until the game gets in a more finished state, but I just wanted to throw in my 2 cents anyways.

Some examples-

Reflection maps for shiny parts, and glass. These do not have to be real-time reflections to be effective, cubemaps would do wonders and are relatively cheap.

Bloom and glow. if used in a subtle way it can be effective at increasing the quality of the look and feel.

Motion blur.

Fog and weather effects on planets with atmospheres. Imagine Eve with a thick atmosphere that obscures your vision, or dust storms on Duna, and rain on Laythe.

Meteor showers and impacts on planets without atmospheres.

Also planet specific effects such as active volcano's and geysers, lava flows and rivers (not just water, but other liquids as well).

Ice and snow that is not just white terrain
